title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Leveraging Visual and Textual Cues for Effective Video Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can improve their understanding of language concepts by at least 30% using video materials that include visual and textual cues.
Learners focus on cue-providing areas for an average of at least two seconds while watching videos to acquire information.
Learners achieve an 80%+ accuracy rate on retention assessments and a 70%+ accuracy rate on transfer assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
